description:
The Story:
Your days are dreamless and mundane until, one night, you notice a star sparkling in the heavens.
Suddenly, the beautiful gods of the stars appear before you.
Their goal? To erase their sins. This exquisite, heartrending true love... all began with a sin.

Characters:
God of Libra Zyglavis
God of Scorpio Scorpio
God of Aries Krioff
God of Virgo Partheno
God of Gemini Dui
God of Pisces Ichthys

Contents:
Includes "Main Stories" in the App "Love 365: Find Your Story."
S1 Prologue
Main Story
His PoV
Epilogue
Sequel
Sequel His PoV
Sequel Epilogue
Musings on Love
S2 Prologue
A Promise of Infinity
A Promise of Infinity His PoV

Notices:
①The following characters' "Musings on Love" are not included.
　Karno, Aigonorus, Krioff, Tauxolouve, Partheno

②"A Promise of Infinity: His PoV" is only available in English
name: Star-Crossed Myth - The Department of Punishments -
intro: "It all started with a sin... Your love story with the frighteningly beautiful gods of the stars."
